channel.title: Golden Pagoda on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Golden Pagoda on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Jurong bird park
item.description: After a full day @ Santosa on Sunday we woke up pretty late. We decided to go for Jurong bird park and offbeat track -Kong Meng San Phor Kark See Monastery, is the largest monastery in Singapore. We had breakfast at ChatterBox as the normal breakfast side was packed. The menu was quite different from the normal side as we had lots of traditional dishes to choose from. As usual Pamela had lots of dim-sum and I preferred the usual cereal and fruits.
